name: Moonwalker
description:
In Moonwalker, you control a astronaut on the moon trying to not get hit by aliens. The game is a endless runner in which you need to type the word on screen to jump, and sometimes the gravity will invert completely, making the astronaut run on the ceiling.

This game was made for the GMTK GameJam 2020, but unfortunatly we weren't able to upload on time for a few reasons.

Still, we learned a lot about game design during this project, and it was the first game our team ever created, with pretty much zero experience.
It's super rough around the edges and a little buggy, but we still wanted to upload it anyway, because it was a amazing experience creating it.

We hope you can enjoy the concept of the game more than the actual gameplay and graphics. 

Credits:

Design and programming: David Brito and José Pirangaba
Art: Isaac Braga and José Guilherme
SFX: Sound FX - Retro Pack from Unity Asset Store
Music: Melody-loops.com
